message: plz cold someone give me a direct link to it thank you
story: Mohamad Emad shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Can`t find debian os source code
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: I spent the entire day googling for the debian os source code but all I could find was ways to build and get src pakges of some programs I would appreciate it enormously if someone gave me a link ...

data.message:
I don't know what the idea of download the entire source code for every package on Debian. As you know Debian is only the kernel and some packages that make Debian what it is, so it will make sense to just get the source code for the package you are interested in

Anyway here is a link for list of DVDs containing the entire source code for every single package on the latest version of Debian 
http://cdimage.debian.org/debian-cd/8.4.0/source/iso-dvd/
